      • createPlayers

        public void createPlayers(int numberOfPlayers,
                          java.lang.String[] names,
                          java.lang.Boolean[] ai,
                          java.util.HashMap<java.lang.Integer,RobotRecord>[] records)
        Method for initializing the players for the match, given some values taken from the user interface.
        Parameters:
        numberOfPlayers - - how many players to create
        names - - Array containing the names of the players.
        ai - - Array containing boolean values of whether the player is AI or not.
        records - - The robot records corresponding to each piece for each player. Blank if the player is a human.
